---
title: AimAhead Portal
subtitle: CHoRUS Azure Data Enclave
---

The CHoRUS AimAhead Portal currently offers a small collection of tools and services.

- Check **[Ares](/ares/)** to characterize data and assess data quality.
- Use **[Atlas](/atlas/)** to conduct scientific analyses, create cohorts, and design models.
- Open a **[User-Specific Portal](/lab/)** to access the ML workspace provisioned for the AimAhead Project
